Ice wolves are a type of wolf found around the Trollweiss Mountain. They can be found on the way to the Ice Path during Desert Treasure and also atop Trollweiss Mountain during Troll Romance.

They are also found near the entrance of God Wars Dungeon. When you push the boulder or use the agility entrance, your run energy will drop to 0, so be very careful. They are dangerous, and can hit 880's and 1350's respectively. While following this path it is highly recommended that you use the Protect from Melee, especially if you have a low Defence level. These can be killed in place of normal wolves for more Slayer experience.

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 12 February 2024 (Update):
    • Rebalanced several low level monsters that were harder to kill than intended
  • update 5 January 2005 (Update):
    • Added to game.
